Serialized Form

  • Package &lt;Unnamed&gt;

    • Class ChessClient extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • idField

          javax.swing.JTextField idField
          Displays what color this player is

        • displayArea

          javax.swing.JTextArea displayArea
          Displays client output

        • boardPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel boardPanel
          JPanel that contains chessboard

        • panel2

          javax.swing.JPanel panel2
          JPanel that contains boardPanel, for easier displaying

        • board

          ChessClient.Square[][] board
          Array of Squares that represents the board

        • moveToSquare

          ChessClient.Square moveToSquare
          Location of currently selected piece

        • moveFromSquare

          ChessClient.Square moveFromSquare
          Attempted move location

        • connection

          java.net.Socket connection
          Socket connecting to server

        • input

          java.util.Scanner input
          Scanner receiving input from server

        • output

          java.util.Formatter output
          Formatter sending output to server

        • ticTacToeHost

          java.lang.String ticTacToeHost
          IP of host

        • myColor

          java.lang.String myColor
          This client's color

        • myTurn

          boolean myTurn
          Boolean determining whether it is this client's turn

        • W_COLOR

          java.lang.String W_COLOR
          Color of first client (white player)

        • B_COLOR

          java.lang.String B_COLOR
          Color of second client (black player)

    • Class ChessServer extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • board

          java.lang.String[] board
          Array of strings containing the pieces at all locations on the board in the format "(piece color)(piece type)" ie "WK" is white king

        • previousBoard

          java.lang.String[] previousBoard
          Array of strings containing the game state before this turn. Used to make sure the player moves out of check if they were threatened

        • outputArea

          javax.swing.JTextArea outputArea
          Text area used to output each attempted move sent to the server

        • players

          ChessServer.Player[] players
          Array containing Player objects representing each player

        • server

          java.net.ServerSocket server
          server socket to connect with clients

        • currentPlayer

          int currentPlayer
          Tracks which player's move it is

        • runGame

          java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService runGame
          ExecutorService that handles threads of both players

        • gameLock

          java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock gameLock
          Lock used to enforce player turns

        • otherPlayerConnected

          java.util.concurrent.locks.Condition otherPlayerConnected
          Lock condition for other player connecting

        • otherPlayerTurn

          java.util.concurrent.locks.Condition otherPlayerTurn
          Lock condition used when trading turns

        • flags

          int[] flags
          Array containing various special case flag variables

        • tempFlags

          int[] tempFlags
          Array containing temporary values of flags in case move is reverted

        • inCheck

          boolean[] inCheck
          Array of booleans storing whether each player is currently in check
